summary: This document is a subpoena issued by the State Attorney's Office in Palm Beach County, Florida, commanding BellSouth Telecommunications to provide subscriber information for a specific telephone number as part of an ongoing investigation. The document emphasizes the importance of confidentiality and the legal consequences of non-compliance.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarey is mentioned as the officer to whom materials may be supplied in compliance with the subpoena.

persons.name: Sharon Bock
persons.context: Sharon Bock is identified as the Clerk of the Court who has signed the subpoena.

persons.name: Lyn Callin
persons.context: Lyn Callin is mentioned as the Notary Public who swore to and subscribed the document.

connections.description: Joe Recarey, as a detective, works under the jurisdiction of the State Attorney's Office, where Sharon Bock serves as Clerk.
Lyn Callin notarized the document which involves Detective Joe Recarey as part of the investigation.

events.title: Issuance of Subpoena
events.description: A subpoena was issued to BellSouth Telecommunications for subscriber information as part of an investigation.

locations: 345 South County Road, Palm Beach, FL 33480
401 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida
122 East Lake Drive, Suite 300, Decatur, GA 30030
keyFacts: The subpoena commands BellSouth Telecommunications to provide subscriber information for a specific telephone number.
The document emphasizes that failure to comply may result in contempt of court.
The subpoena is part of an official investigation by the Town of Palm Beach Police Department.
